html.label: HTML
html.description: Standard markup language for creating web pages.

css.description: Cascading Style Sheets used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML.

javascript.label: JavaScript

typescript.description: Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.

angular.description: Platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

react.description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

next.js.label: Next.js
next.js.description: JavaScript framework for production: React, Node.js, server rendering, and more.

bootstrap.label: Bootstrap
bootstrap.description: Open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first web development.

tailwind.label: Tailwind
tailwind.description: A utility-first CSS framework for building custom designs.

nodejs.label: Node.js
nodejs.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

nestjs.label: NestJS
nestjs.description: A framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable server-side applications.

linux.label: Linux
linux.description: Open-source operating system based on the Linux kernel.

python.label: Python
python.description: High-level programming language designed for readability.

sql.label: SQL
sql.description: Programming language used for communicating with databases.

jasmine.label: Jasmine
jasmine.description: A behavior-driven development framework for testing JavaScript code.

notion.label: Notion
notion.description: Productivity application that combines kanban boards, databases, tasks, and notes.
